text: I see your user in the db... Ah! Try using your email address in the username field. I'm going to update it so that either works haha

text: I logged in, but I got an error when I tried to post something.

text:
Thanks! I just made the textarea a bit larger.

It's weird that you can't submit a post. Make sure you add a tag from the dropdown when submitting?

text: As <@UC2A2ARPT> posted elsewhere, my app is an unofficial suggestion/prototype! Slack is still the official thing until he says otherwise. Sorry for any confusion

posted elsewhere, my app is an unofficial suggestion/prototype! Slack is still the official thing until he says otherwise. Sorry for any confusion

text: No worries. Just reporting bugs, not complaining. Can be hard to tell the difference. Nice effort, thanks!

text: Thanks! I think I limited the characters to 1441 characters, so you might've hit that limit. Feel free to throw future bug reports over here: <https://github.com/surprisetalk/ding/issues>
